effect.sun_moon: The user’s original Attack and Defense are swapped. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user’s original Attack and Defense are swapped. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user’s original Attack and Defense are swapped. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.
